product_name: The North Face Chimborazo Full-Zip Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Trek mountain peaks or urban canyons in comfort when you wear the heavyweight Chimborazo Full-Zip Fleece Jacket for men from The North Face. Soft, brushed exterior backed with luxurious high-loft Sherpa fleece offers signifcant warmth. Overlay chest pocket is constructed of quick-drying TNF(R) Apex soft-shell fabric treated with a durable water repellent finish and a bonded edge at opening. Zippered hand pockets secure essentials. The North Face Chimborazo Full-Zip Fleece Jacket for men features an adjustable hem to seal in warmth. Closeout.
short_description: Trek mountain peaks or urban canyons in comfort when you wear the heavyweight Chimborazo Full-Zip Fleece Jacket for men from The North Face.
